Comment.val: di SAP create or alter view ItemHistory as select ItemCode, Sum(U_IDU_QtyPack) 'Qty2' from atm.dbo.OBTN (nolock) group by ItemCode

SQL_STMT_U.val: select TransType,Fuel,MaxODO,ItemCode,ItemName,OnHand,InvntItem,Availabel,TypeItem,DocEntry from ( SELECT A.TransType,A.Fuel,A.MaxODO,A.ItemCode, B.ItemName, 0 as OnHand, B.InvntItem, 0 as Availabel, 'Package' as TypeItem , A.DocEntry FROM ORTV A JOIN OITM B ON A.ITEMCODE = B.ITEMCODE WHERE isActive = 'Y' :3 :4 :5 :6 UNION SELECT 'All','All',-1,O.ItemCode, O.ItemName, Isnull(O1.OnHand,0) OnHand, O.InvntItem, isnull(isnull(O1.OnHand,O.OnHand)- isnull(O1.IsCommited,O.IsCommited),0) Available, 'Non Package', 0 FROM OITM O (nolock) left join oita O1 (nolock) on O1.Itemcode=O.Itemcode WHERE O.validFor = 'Y' AND O.ItemType = 'I' and O1.BplId=:2 and o.ItemCode not in (select ItemCode from ORTV) ) A :1 ORDER BY MaxODO DESC

ExpSyntax.val: IF(Trim({1,3})='','',' WHERE (upper(A.ItemCode) like '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%'&Trim(Upper(uSafeSqlStr({1,3})))&'%'&ASCIIChr(39)&' OR upper(A.ItemName) like '&ASCIIChr(39)&'%'&Trim(Upper(uSafeSqlStr({1,3})))&'%'&ASCIIChr(39)&')')
IF({1,10} < 0 OR ISNULL({1,10}),'AND A.MAXODO = 1','AND (A.MAXODO >= '&ASCIIChr(39)&Trim(Str({1,10},'15'))&ASCIIChr(39)&' OR A.MAXODO = 1)')
